trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement>發生事件，只有當您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。
